This is NOT an easy webpage with HTML & CSS. It's not superhard using WebGL/WebGPU from scratch either. This is Three.js. This was a preliminary three.js environment done to find out the best engineered well-tested way to fill the vertex buffers & see what the vertex shaders & fragment shaders are, and have a incremental prototyping option to convert to Rust, with rust crate "WGPU" or other Rust graphics libraries.
